subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade’s jumper with 0.1 seconds left in overtime gave Miami a 93-91 win over Indiana, extending the Heat’s home-court winning streak to 12 games.
snippet: Dwyane Wade’s jumper with 0.1 seconds left in overtime gave Miami a 93-91 win over Indiana, extending the Heat’s home-court winning streak to 12 games.
